actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 93-230.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-213.

official_title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing as a House document of a revised edition of "The Capitol".

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides that a revised edition of "The Capitol", compiled under the direction of the Joint Committee on Printing, be printed with illustrations as a House document, and that 575,000 additional copies be printed, of which 442,000 copies for the use of the House of Representatives, 103,000 copies for the use of the Senate, and 30,000 copies would be for the use of the Joint Committee on Printing.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing as a House document of a revised edition of "The Capitol".
